title: (x) Couple of sans serifs - various {gang}
content:
A couple of similar sans serif faces, which are quite obvious and default, which is why I can’t from the top of my head identify them. The samples come from [HEY HO](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007003757/http:/www.heyho.fr/fr/hey_ho).

[sample 1](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007003757/http:/www.heyho.fr/dynamics/articles/pictures/postermurs.jpg)  
 [sample 2](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007003757/http:/www.heyho.fr/dynamics/articles/pictures/marcus_13.jpg)  
 [sample 3](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007003757/http:/www.heyho.fr/dynamics/articles/pictures/particules_19_061.jpg)  
 [sample 4](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007003757/http:/www.heyho.fr/dynamics/articles/pictures/particules_17_041.jpg)  
 [sample 5](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007003757/http:/www.heyho.fr/dynamics/articles/pictures/marie_081.jpg)  
 [sample 6](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007003757/http:/www.heyho.fr/dynamics/articles/pictures/galaade_howdoesit_02.jpg)

Thanks in advance, and my apologies for the easy ID’s. ;)

Edit:

sample 1 - Helvetica Neue Bold Condensed  
sample 2 - Helvetica Neue Bold Condensed  
sample 3 - Folio  
sample 4 - Folio  
sample 5 - Franklin Gothic  
sample 6 - Swiss 721 Black Condensed

 [‹ (x) "Man from U.N.C.L.E." television series logo - Profil (Decorated 035) {Thomas Levine}](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007003757/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43465 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Dart Distribution decorative display type - Kino {David Hamuel} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007003757/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43462 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Quincunx

comments.content:
#3 and #4 look like Folio.  
#5(2-Marie) is Franklin Gothic.

Thanks. Edited first post with your ID’s.  
Only sample 6 to go. :)

6 could be Swis 721 Black Condensed.  
-  
Arun  
-

Yep, I think you’re right with Swiss 721.

Great, guys. :)
